titles.title: To amend section 6901 of title 31, United States Code, to provide for certain lands taken into trust for Indian tribes to be included in the definition of entitlement land.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.

bill.summary: 9/26/1996--Introduced. Amends Federal law relating to payment for entitlement land to include in the definition of entitlement land certain lands taken into trust for Indian tribes.
